item.title: Report E-2025030404
item.description:
Report E-2025030404

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-27T15:24:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 2314 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal UDV. It was reported that approximately 100-gallons of "CHEM-AQUA 18104" released from (2) plastic drums due to improper loading. The release impacted inside of trailer #3194740. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are not capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. An ETA for cleanup will be provided once confirmed. ERTS notified Chemtrec, Chelsea provided report #2025022600235 Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 50-gallons of UN2920 Chem-Aqua 18104 product released impacting 15’x9’ area inside trailer and outside of the trailer due to the load shifting during transit. The contractors neutralized the released product and impacted surfaces with oil dri, then overpacked (2) 30-gallon plastic drums into (2) 55-gallon poly drums, broken up pallet into (1) 55-gallon poly drum, and impacted oil dri into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
